abstract: Carl C. Icahn announced on Monday that he had gotten the right to buy CVR Energy, after a majority of shareholders agreed to sell their shares.
snippet: Carl C. Icahn announced on Monday that he had gotten the right to buy CVR Energy, after a majority of shareholders agreed to sell their shares.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn has emerged victorious in yet another grueling takeover fight, this time for control of CVR Energy.

headline.main: Majority of CVR Shareholders Accept Icahn Offer
